home.title: Welcome to our website
home.welcomeMessage: We're glad to have you here.

hero.headline: Build Future-Ready
hero.description: Vooksio helps developers create powerful, scalable web applications with ease.

services.subtitle: We offer a complete ecosystem of services designed to help you build, learn, and scale with confidence.

services.title: Software Engineering
services.description: Full-stack web and mobile app development with modern technologies and best practices.

services.title: Technical Education
services.description: Hands-on learning experiences that teach real-world development skills through building.

services.title: Product Consulting
services.description: Strategic guidance to help you validate ideas, plan features, and execute with confidence.

services.specialtiesDescription: Our expertise spans across various types of applications and platforms

specialties.title: Web Applications
specialties.description: Responsive, fast, and scalable web apps

specialties.title: Learning Platforms
specialties.description: Educational tools and interactive learning experiences

specialties.title: Team Collaboration
specialties.description: Tools that bring teams together and boost productivity

values.subtitle: Our values shape how we work, learn, and build together. They guide every decision and project we take on.

items.title: Build with Purpose
items.description: We focus on real-world outcomes that matter to your users and business goals.

items.title: Teach by Doing
items.description: Learning happens best through hands-on building and real project experience.

items.title: Communicate Clearly
items.description: Transparency and clarity in everything we do, from code to client relationships.

items.title: Collaborate with Empathy
items.description: Respectful, inclusive teamwork that values diverse perspectives and experiences.

items.title: Ship Smart & Lean
items.description: Fast, focused execution with continuous improvement and iterative development.

principles: Code fluency combined with clear communication
values.approachP1: Vooksio is a modern, founder-led studio that blends software engineering, technical education, and product consulting. We believe in a build-first mindset where real products matter more than theory.
values.approachP2: We're fluent in both code and communication, helping startups and learners turn ideas into functional web and mobile applications with speed, clarity, and purpose.

sectionHeader.title: Built for Every Stage
sectionHeader.description: Whether you're starting your journey or scaling your business, we have the expertise to help you succeed.

audiences.title: Creators & Founders
audiences.description: Turn your vision into reality with expert technical partnership

audiences.title: Junior Developers
audiences.description: Accelerate your career with real-world project experience

audiences.title: Tech Learners
audiences.description: Master app development through structured, hands-on learning

audiences.title: Startups & Small Teams
audiences.description: Scale your product with expert engineering and consulting

audiences.title: Outsourcing Companies

cta.title: Ready to Start Building?
cta.description: No matter where you are in your journey, we're here to help you build something amazing. Let's turn your ideas into reality.

footer.description: A modern, founder-led studio blending software engineering, technical education, and product consulting to help turn ideas into real apps.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
newsletter.description: Get insights on app development, learning resources, and industry trends.

contact.title: Ready to Build Something Amazing?
contact.description: Let's discuss your project, learning goals, or how we can help you scale. We're here to turn your ideas into reality.
